comments.body: This seems to be the only place we're documenting this for posterity - I'd be ok with just removing the `cloudfront_facts` info unless you want to do the same for all the other modules?
Right now, I've only added this part to modules which were documenting how to use the facts before. The other modules didn't do that.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +182,186 @@- cloudfront_facts:
    distribution: true
    distribution_id: my-cloudfront-distribution-id
- debug:
    msg: "{{ ansible_facts['cloudfront']['my-cloudfront-distribution-id'] }}"
